statements: SELECT * FROM clinics;
SELECT clinic_id, clinic_name, clinic_address FROM clinics WHERE clinic_name = 'XYZ Clinic';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_phone_number FROM clinics WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT clinic_name, appointment_timeslot FROM clinics ORDER BY appointment_timeslot DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinics WHERE appointment_reminder_notification = true;
SELECT clinic_name, clinic_address FROM clinics WHERE appointment_reminder_notification = TRUE;
SELECT clinic_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM clinics GROUP BY clinic_name;
SELECT DISTINCT clinic_name, clinic_address FROM clinics ORDER BY clinic_name DESC;
SELECT clinic_name, patient_name, patient_dob FROM clinics WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT clinic_name, clinic_address, appointment_timeslot FROM clinics WHERE appointment_timeslot BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Clinics;
SELECT clinic_name, address FROM Clinics;
SELECT clinic_id, clinic_name, phone_number FROM Clinics WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clinics WHERE clinic_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT clinic_name, address FROM Clinics WHERE clinic_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY clinic_name;
SELECT clinic_name, phone_number FROM Clinics ORDER BY clinic_name DESC;
SELECT clinic_name, appointment_date FROM Clinics JOIN Appointments ON Clinics.clinic_id = Appointments.clinic_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, status FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-12-12';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_time, message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, status FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT reminders.message, patients.first_name, patients.last_name FROM reminders INNER JOIN patients ON reminders.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE status='Scheduled';
SELECT clinic_id, clinic_name FROM Clinics ORDER BY clinic_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number, email FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT notification_id, notification_type, sent_at FROM Notifications WHERE sent_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE clinic_id = some_uuid_value;
SELECT clinic_name, clinic_address, contact_person FROM Clinics ORDER BY clinic_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number, email FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' AND date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT notification_type, notification_content FROM Notifications WHERE sent_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clinics;
SELECT name, location FROM Clinics;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message, sent_date FROM Notifications WHERE sent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Clinics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_id, patient_id FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT message, sent_date FROM Notifications WHERE sent_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2021-08-01' AND '2021-09-01' ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
